body_html: @zuoxingdong can you try this : CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE="/usr/local/cuda-9.2/bin/nvcc" NO_SYSTEM_NCCL=1 VERBOSE=1 python setup.py install The trick for me was the CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE you may not need to set NO_SYSTEM_NCCL=1, make sure to do a python setup.py clean first.
body_text: @zuoxingdong can you try this :  CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE="/usr/local/cuda-9.2/bin/nvcc" NO_SYSTEM_NCCL=1 VERBOSE=1 python setup.py install        The trick for me was the CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE      you may not need to set NO_SYSTEM_NCCL=1,  make sure to do a python setup.py clean first.
